name: Pink Grapefruit Margarita
description: This Pink Grapefruit Margarita is similar to a Paloma but without the soda! This recipe is vegan, gluten-free, and refined sugar-free.
ingredients: Sea salt, to rim the glass
directions: Wet the rim of a glass with a cut piece of the grapefruit or lime
Pour the sea salt on a plate and dip the wet rim into the salt
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice then add the tequila, pink grapefruit juice, lime juice, and agave
Shake until cold then strain into the prepared glass
Garnish with a slice of grapefruit
